projects.name: Dollar Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a responsive financial SPA with Node.js backend and MongoDB, featuring data visualizations that improved user engagement by 30% and budgeting efficiency by 40%.

projects.name: Cloud-Native Web Application (Node.js, PostgreSQL, AWS)
projects.description: Built a cloud-native web app REST APIs using node.js, PostgreSQL, RESTful APIs, AWS S3, and DNS mapping for enhanced UX. Created custom AMIs with Packer and managed infrastructure-as-code with Terraform (VPCs, subnets, routes, EC2/RDS instances, S3 buckets, ELBs, security groups) by implementing version control on Git having low latency and high reliability. Implemented robust CI/CD pipelines on GitHub for seamless integration and rapid code deployment.

projects.name: WordWise
projects.description: Developed an iOS app using Swift and Firebase, implementing async loading and efficient data management, resulting in 10% vocabulary improvement in child users.
